name: 胡安·丹尼尔·费尔南德斯·莫莱罗
name_full: 胡安·丹尼尔·费尔南德斯·莫莱罗 Juan Daniel Fernández Molero

last_movies.title: La chucha perdida de los incas

introduction: Juan Daniel F. Molero (b. Lima 1987) studied at Universidad del Cine in Buenos aires, is alumnus of IFFR Trainee Project for Young Film Critics 2010, Buenos Aires Talent Campus 2010, and Berlinale Talent Campus 2011. His first feature film Reminiscencias (2010), an autobiographical and neurological experiment, has screened in venues such as MoMA's Modern Mondays, BAFICI, Rotterdam, Art Museum of Lima, La Habana, Lima Independiente and FIDMarseille. His latest short film is Imagenotfound (2013) screened at Flaherty NYC, Valdivia Internatioanl Film Festival, and Lima Independiente Film Festival. He has curated and organized programs of avant-garde film for Cinema Tropical, Anthology Film Archives, Lima Independent Film Festival, MassArt Film Society, Art Museum of Lima (MALI), and Cine//B Festival in Chile. His second feature is "Videophilia (and other viral syndromes)", a micro budget fiction shot in his hometown between 2013 and 2014.
